title: Bvlgari B.Zero1 Diamond Ring
description: Bvlgari B.Zero1 three-band ring with 4 round Natural Diamonds totalling approximately 0.08ct. 18ct rose gold. Bvlgari stamped size 54, measures as Australian size: M - ring resizing is not recommended. Width: 8mm. Weight: 9.7g. With Bvlgari box. (Pre-owned)
